poem:
The Enigma of Gossip

Words weave shadows in our minds,
beneath the glacial silence of power,
a woman stands, her integrity framed
by whispers. Let us see her not 
with the mirrored gaze of men,
but through the transparent lens 
of truth, unclouded, as morning light
pierces the mist of unwarranted secrets.
